name: Whales
author: Werd Web Dev
description: Epic Duelsâ€“compatible deck for a mystical Beluga Whale and its Humpback Whale protector.

cards.name: Mystic Echo Pulse
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to an enemy within 6 squares.

cards.name: Psychic Sonar
cards.rulesText: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck, keep 1, return the rest in any order.

cards.name: Breach & Splash
cards.rulesText: Move up to 4 squares ignoring terrain; each enemy you pass through takes 3 damage.

cards.name: Ocean Current Drift
cards.rulesText: Teleport up to 5 squares and gain Hasted this turn.

cards.name: Thunderous Clicks
cards.rulesText: Stun an enemy within 4 squares and pull it 3 squares toward you.

cards.name: Sonic Boom
cards.rulesText: Deal 4 damage to all adjacent enemies; you take 1 damage.

cards.name: Song of the White Whale
cards.rulesText: Heal all allies within 3 squares for 3 HP and remove Immobilized.

cards.name: Bulk Interpose
cards.rulesText: The next attack that would hit an adjacent ally hits you instead and damage is reduced by 2.

cards.name: Deep Breach Ram
cards.rulesText: Move up to 3 squares in a straight line; deal 4 damage and push the target 2 squares.

cards.name: Harmonized Song
cards.rulesText: Heal an ally within 3 squares for 3 HP.

cards.name: Ocean Colossus Stance
cards.rulesText: Until your next turn you cannot be pushed/pulled and gain Fortified.

cards.name: Unyielding Mass
cards.rulesText: Swap places with an ally within 4 squares; both gain Regenerating.

cards.name: Tsunami Tandem
cards.rulesText: Both figures move up to 3 squares; each then deals 3 damage to a different enemy they can see.
